name: The Black Sheep Backpackers
description:
Black Sheep Backpackers offers guests a convenient place to stay in the heart of picturesque Queenstown. Our central location is one of the sunniest in town and offers 360 views of the majestic local mountain ranges, including the famous Remarkables.

Black Sheep has a lot to offer guests including: 
⭐ An awesome team of friendly staff
⭐ GOKI app instead of pesky keys
⭐ NEW MATTRESSES
⭐ Sauna
⭐ NEW spa pool
⭐ Free bike hire
⭐ Unlimited WIFI
⭐ BBQ deck
⭐ Lounge with free netflix
⭐ Fireplace during the winter months
⭐ Free use of mac computers
⭐ Ski and luggage storage
⭐ Travel desk and advice to book your activities for you


With all the social events and array of communal areas, Blacksheep has repeatedly been called by guests the ‘easiest hostel to make friends in Queenstown’. So why not join in on the action by staying in one of our dorms, or check out our private double, twin, super king or triple rooms.

LOCATION: 13 Frankton Road.
 🚶  Beside the historic Queenstown Gardens, just a couple of minutes walk from the lake front and center of town!
🚌  20 minute bus ride away from the Airport. The bus (called 1) comes every 15 minutes from the stop right outside the arrivals gate of Queenstown Airport and you get off at the Garden Court stop which is a 1 minute walk from Black Sheep. 
🚗  15 minutes drive from the Airport. There is free on-street car parking around the hostel. 

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Check in time: 3 pm onward. 
 Please notify the property in advance if arriving after 9pm.
 Check out time: 10 am.

IMPORTANT BOOKING INFORMATION
 ❗ Please note that the number of people per room is not guaranteed and can be changed as required by the property, regardless of original booking request.
 ❗ Our standard cancellation policy is 4 days. However, this excludes guests booking with our weekly rate (contact Blacksheep directly for access to this), new year bookings, discounted special or groups. These are all paid upfront and non refundable.
 ❗ Please note the additional fee for pre charging your card is 3.5%.
 ❗ Our alcohol policy is no drinking onsite after 8:30pm (excluding special events periods where further restrictions are mirrored by the Queenstown Council).
❗ Guests found to have caused damage, triggered security callouts, or engaged in conduct requiring investigation may be liable for associated costs, including CCTV extraction.
 ❗ Persons who are not a guest of Black Sheep are not allowed to stay on the property. Any extra people will be charged and asked to leave immediately.
 ❗ The property has the rights to refuse any booking and bookings can be cancelled at the discretion of the property.

CANCELLATION POLICY
All bookings are non-refundable or ammendable from 4 days prior to the day of check in. For regular bookings, if you cancel outside of the standard 4 day cancellation policy, you will not be charged. 
For group bookings, new years bookings and weekly rates, see conditions below.
We do not provide refunds for weather events, travel delays or road closures. We recommend that you take out travel insurance for your vacation.

GROUP BOOKINGS
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Please note group bookings (6 or more) have to be booked directly and can be cancelled at the discretion of the property. Additionally, any bookings which are made separate that are deemed to be together can be charged as a group or cancelled by the discretion of The Black Sheep Backpackers.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 $50 CASH deposit per person on arrival is required as a security deposit for the whole group (example.6 Adults x $50 = $300). This will be refunded during check-out upon no damages have occurred by the group during your stay.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Full payment is required at the time of making the reservation and is non-refundable and non-transferable under any circumstance from this stage.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 A valid credit card is required to be kept on file per room as a security for hostel damages.

CAMPERVANS
🚐 Vans should not be more than 2.8 meters long.
🚐 We accept non-self contained vans as you have access to our bathroom facilities.
🚫 We do not accept motorhomes or tents.
🚫 Tables and hanging of clothes on the fences and within the hostel is not possible.
🚮 Dispose the rubbish properly and do not litter on the parking spaces.

ONLY FOR NEW YEAR’S PERIOD
🎆 5 night minimum stay required.
🎆 New year’s booking will be charged in full at the time of making the reservation, which are non-refundable and non-transferable.
🎆 We allow no one under the age of 18 for New Years 28/12 - 03/01.
🎆 I.D must be provided at check in. We accept a passport, driver’s license or HANZ 18+ card ONLY.
🎆 There will be a liquor ban in place mirroring the Queenstown Lakes District and alcohol cannot be consumed on the premises.

PAYMENT POLICY
Payments are non refundable from 4 days prior to the day of check in. 
Bookings under our weekly rate, discounted special or group bookings. These are all paid upfront and are non-refundable and non-transferable.
We accept EFTPOS and Credit card (Credit Card and international card have a 3.5% surcharge).
We do NOT Accept CASH
We also have towels available $5 Hire fee

houseRules.notes:
TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Check in time: 3 pm onward. 
Please notify the property in advance if arriving after 9pm.
Check out time: 10 am.

IMPORTANT BOOKING INFORMATION 

❗ Please note that the number of people per room is not guaranteed and can be changed as required by the property, regardless of original booking request. 
❗ Our standard cancellation policy is available up to 4 days prior to the day of check in. However, this excludes guests booking with our weekly rate (contact Black Sheep directly for access to this), Christmas/New Year bookings, discounted specials or groups. These are all paid upfront and are non-refundable or transferable under any circumstances.
❗ No shows will still be fully charged, then will be cancelled after the first night. If you are delayed and are not able to attend the first night of your booking but would like to keep the reservation, please contact us directly. 
❗ Please note the additional fee for pre charging your card is 3.38%.
❗ Our alcohol policy is no drinking onsite after 8:30pm (excluding special events periods where further restrictions are mirrored by the Queenstown Council).
❗ Guests found to have caused damage, triggered security callouts, or engaged in conduct requiring investigation may be liable for associated costs, including CCTV extraction. 
❗ Only guests with a valid reservation for Black Sheep Backpackers are allowed to visit and stay on the property. Persons found to be staying on the premises without a valid reservation will be charged and asked to leave immediately. 
❗ The property has the rights to refuse any booking and bookings can be cancelled at the discretion of the property.

CANCELLATION POLICY

All bookings become non-refundable from 4 days prior to the day of check in. For regular bookings, if you cancel outside of the standard 4 day cancellation policy, you will not be charged. 
For group bookings, Christmas/New Years and weekly rates, see conditions below.
We do not provide refunds for weather events, travel delays or unforseen circumstancs. We recommend that you take out travel insurance for your vacation.

GROUP BOOKINGS

🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Please note group bookings (6 or more) have to be booked directly and can be cancelled at the discretion of the property. Additionally, any bookings which are made separate that are deemed to be together can be charged as a group or cancelled by the discretion of The Black Sheep Backpackers.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 $50 CASH deposit per person on arrival is required as a security deposit for the whole group (example 6 Adults x $50 = $300). This will be refunded after check-out if no damages have occurred by the group during your stay.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Full payment is required at the time of making the reservation and is non-refundable or transferable under any circumstance from this stage.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 A valid credit card is required to be kept on file per room as security for hostel damages.

CAMPERVANS

🚐 Vans should not be more than 4.5 meters long.
🚐 We accept non-self contained vans as you have access to our bathroom facilities.
🚫 We do not accept motorhomes or tents.
🚫 Tables and hanging of clothes on the fences and within the hostel is not possible.
🚮 Dispose the rubbish properly and do not litter on the parking spaces.

ONLY FOR CHRISTMAS/NEW YEAR’S PERIOD

🎆 5 night minimum stay required.
🎆 Bookings will be charged in full at the time of making the reservation, and are non-refundable or transferable under any circumstances.
🎆 The minimum age for New Years (28/12 - 03/01) is 18 years old.
🎆 I.D must be provided at check in. We accept a passport, driver’s license or HANZ 18+ card ONLY.
🎆 There will be a liquor ban in place mirroring the Queenstown Lakes District and alcohol cannot be consumed on the premises.

PAYMENT POLICY

❗ Full payment will automatically be taken 4 days prior to the day of check in. If the payment is unsuccessful, the booking can be cancelled at any time at the discretion of the property.
❗ Any bookings over $1500 NZD, will be charged at any time at the discretion of the property.
❗ Payments are non-refundable from 4 days prior to the day of check in. 
❗ Bookings under our weekly rate, discounted specials or group bookings are all paid upfront and are non-refundable or transferable under any circumstances.
❗ We accept EFTPOS and Credit card. Please note there is a 3.5% surcharge for using Visa, Mastercard and international cards.
❗ We do NOT Accept CASH
❗ We also have towels available $10 deposit + $5 cleaning fee.
